qas.question: What determines which team gets possession first when extending a game to break a tie?
At which yard line on their opponent's side does a team take possession of the ball according to the CFL's tie-breaking rules?
In which year did the CFL begin requiring teams to attempt 2-point conversions after scoring in a tie-breaking situation?
Which round of tie-breaking is the last possible round in a regular season CFL game?
Which CFL games require tie-breaking rounds continue until a winner results?
After teams have completed their 2 point conversions, who is declared the winner?
If a game is tied at the end of a touchdown, what determines who takes possession?

plausible_answers.text: during the regular season the game ends as a tie

qas.question: After the coin toss if there is no winner during regular season what happens?

plausible_answers.text: it is required to attempt a 2-point conversion

qas.question: What is a team required to do after having a possession in the 2010 season?

plausible_answers.text: each team is given an equal number of chances to break the tie

qas.question: In the 2010 season if a game is tied what can each team do?
